entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:32 PM CDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:32 PM CDT Sunday 19 March 2023
